EmailTemplate.description: Automatic email informing the recipient(s) that a student has been registered as A/Deposit or W/List A/Deposit and the relevant F/info request status
EmailTemplate.name: Grp/Adm Email Informing of Stage Changed to A/Deposit and F/Info Request Status
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.School_Acronym__c} Admissions Update - {!Opportunity.Name} ({!Opportunity.Year_Group__c}) is now {!Opportunity.StageName}
